lines.irish:
Tá mé ag dul a bheith
Chomh hard inniu
lines.english:
I'm going to be
So high today

lines.irish:
Mar níl aon rud i'd
Rather do
lines.english:
Because there's nothing
I’d rather do

lines.irish:
Ach a bheith i measc an
3CAG Criú
lines.english:
But to be among the
3CAG crew
